channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Clive Myrie's Italian Roadtrip
channel.desc: Starting at his favourite holiday spot on the Amalfi coast, Clive goes inland to a mozzarella factory, where he discovers how to make everyone's favourite stringy cheese. Next, he heads to Capri, where he makes his wife Catherine a pair of the Capri sandals made famous by Jackie Kennedy and spends the evening singing Italian folk songs on stage at a club favoured by A-listers like Beyonce and Jay Z.
